extendedInfo.description: This Live Wallpaper is about the Eclipse of the sun by the moon, creating a Ring of fire around the moon. This stunning once in a blue moon event is enhanced with lighting and particle effects. Features Include:Options for transparent box2 different light sourceOption to move lightOption to change viewing angle and change background color.Option for Auto rotation with speed control, or manual control with finger swipe.

reviews.title: Awful.
reviews.comment: Absolutely terrible! 0 stars (I can\'t make it 0). Don\'t waste your time! Not worth crap.
reviews.author: A Google User
